actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income the portion of a scholarship which covers living expenses while away from home.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income scholarship amounts used for a student's reasonable living expenses while attending school away from home.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income the portion of a scholarship which covers living expenses while away from home.
